There are many different types of monsters. Each of them has unique
To defeat a monster of a certain class and species, experienced
hunters study all its strengths and weaknesses. And only then they
think up the fastest and most optimal way to capture or kill him.
But among the monsters there are those who possess intelligence and
those who do not possess it but are able to adapt and mutate. For
such species, the same capture/killing methods do not work twice.
The Great Monster Encyclopedia currently contains information about
all the monsters found on the lands of the Kingdom. However, beyond
its borders there are still a lot of unknown and unstudied species.
